title: Rain Through Glass
description: A night photograph captured from inside a car, focusing on raindrops on the window and soft neon reflections outside. The image plays with depth, blur, and light to create a quiet, reflective mood.

title: Mexico Day
description: This is the famous blowhole in Mexico. I went with my family and had a lot of fun! :D It was loud, windy, and honestly kind of wild seeing the water shoot up between the rocks. One of those moments you just stop and stare.
